item.description:
Update: Sorry for the change from Saturday to Sunday. But Sunday is cheaper. Additionally, Robyn found us a discount. Buy your ticket before Jan. 14th and use discount code EXTRAS to get $20 off the published ticket price!


It's time for the annual Boston Wine Expo again. Several of us have gone the past 3 years and we've really enjoyed it. It's a good way to sample wines that you probably wouldn't ordinarily.

Cost: $85. Go to the Boston Wine Expo website for more information and buy tickets, or check your local liquor store. Wine Expo Website

Directions: By "T", take the Silver Line to World Trade Center.
item.how_to_find_us: We will exchange cell phone numbers with anybody that RSVPs YES.
item.name: Boston Wine Expo
